actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to restore citizenship to persons who renounced or otherwise lost American nationality because of opposition to American military action in Indochina.

summary.text: Restores citizenship fully and unconditionally to persons who renounced or otherwise lost American nationality because of opposition to American military action in Indochina, upon petition to any district court of the United States. States that any such petition shall include a sworn statement by the petitioner that the loss of nationality resulted from action taken solely or partially because of the petitioner's opposition to the involvement of the United States in military activity in Indochina.

titles.title: A bill to restore citizenship to persons who renounced or otherwise lost American nationality because of opposition to American military action in Indochina.
